sentence: However, Schobert currently stands as the team’s fifth-highest paid player behind T.J. Watt, Cameron Heyward, Stephon Tuitt and Minkah Fitzpatrick.
author: DJ Siddiqi
title: Steelers ‘Must Consider Cutting’ Ex-Pro Bowl Linebacker
